page.title: 09Questionnaires
page.content: On June 10th 1985 Ysgol y Gelli Class 4 went down to Pool Street(Stryd LLyn).We were in groups of twos and we had a questionnaire prepared in English and Welsh. We asked the local people these questions. 1.Where do you live? 2.Do you come into town often? 3.Do you like Caernarfon? 4.Would you change something in the town? 5.Have you visited the leisure centre?If so did you like it? 6Do you like Pool Street as it is today?(It had been pedestrianist in 1985) 7.Do you think that there is too much litter on the streets of Caernarfon? 8.Have you bought something in Caernarfon today?
